title: Alien Hornet
summaries: The Alien Hornet is a Hardmode, post-Lunatic Cultist enemy that is summoned by the Vortex Pillar during the Lunar Events, which are spawned by an opened portal in groups of two. If not killed fast enough, it will fairly quickly grow into an Alien Queen. They also grow from the Alien Larva that spawn from the death of an Alien Queen.

statistics.Damage: 75/150/225
statistics.Max Life: 500/1000/1500
statistics.KB Resist: 50%/55%/60%
statistics.Banner: [img:Alien Hornet Banner]Alien Hornet Banner
